answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Then test for diabetes first. It is not compulsory for all with diabetes to have a family history. The other possibility is severe acidity. Insulinomas or insulin secreting tumors could also be the cause.Also after a meal one should not exercise. A minimum gap of 2 hours should be given. Hope this helps. Take care!

question: I am a 19 year old male, and i have found that after eating a meal. then goin on to do something involving exercise, like sports. i begin to feel very weak and start to sweat more so than usual. also i get a craving for sugar e.g a chocolate bar. and after eating something sugary i feel better. there is noone with diabeties in my family and i have never been tested for it.
title: weak after a meal
